invisible-hand.author: Fantasy Flight Games
invisible-hand.name: Invisible Hand
invisible-hand.ability: While deploying fleets, if you are in the play area, when you would deploy a squadron with swarm, you may set that squadron aside next to your ship card instead. You may set aside up to 5 squadrons this way. :squadron: : For each squadron you would activate with this command, you may place 1 of your set-aside squadrons within distance 3. It cannot move this activation, and if it has AI, increase its AI value by 1.
